CustomField.description: This pertains to the commission chargeable to the Borrower or Customer for whom the Letter of Credit was established. The Commission could be stated as a percentage of an agreed base or as a fixed amount (the "$" sign should be included if this field will contain a fixed dollar amount).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This pertains to the commission chargeable to the Borrower or Customer for whom the Letter of Credit was established.
CustomField.label: Commission Description
